trans-unit.source: Represents a class that can read and write key identifiers, key identifier clauses, and security tokens.

Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class to read and write <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken> classes as XML.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class has methods to determine whether this class can read and write these entities and to actually read and write them.

For security tokens, these methods are <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadToken%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteToken%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadToken%2A>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.WriteToken%2A>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> class.
Determines whether this serializer can read the `<KeyIdentifier>` element referred to by the specified XML reader.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifier%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%2A> method.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read the key identifier.
`true` when the specified `<KeyIdentifier>` XML element can be read; otherwise, `false`.
reader is `null`.
Determines whether this serializer can read a clause in a `<KeyIdentifier>` element referred to by the specified XML reader.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierClauseCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierClause%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierClauseCore%2A> method.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read the key identifier clause.
`true` when the specified key identifier clause can be read; otherwise, `false`.
reader is `null`.
Determines whether this serializer can read the `<KeyIdentifier>` element referred to by the specified XML reader.
Called by the base class.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierClauseCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierClause%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierClauseCore%2A> method.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read the key identifier clause.
`true` when the specified `<KeyIdentifier>` element can be read; otherwise, `false`.
reader is `null`.
Determines whether this serializer can read the `<KeyIdentifier>` element referred to by the specified XML reader.
Called by the base class.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifier%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%2A> method.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read the key identifier.
`true` when the specified key identifier clause can be read; otherwise, `false`.
reader is `null`.
Determines whether this serializer can read the security token pointed at by the specified XML reader.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadTokenCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadToken%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadTokenCore%2A> method.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read the security token.
`true` when the security token can be read; otherwise, `false`.
reader is `null`.
Determines whether this serializer can read the security token pointed at by the specified XML reader.
Called by the base class.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadTokenCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadToken%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadTokenCore%2A> method.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read the security token.
`true` when the security token can be read; otherwise, `false`.
reader is `null`.
Determines whether this serializer can write the specified key identifier.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteKeyIdentifierCore%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier%29> method.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteKeyIdentifier%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier%29> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteKeyIdentifierCore%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier%29> method.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"></xref> that represents the key identifier to write.
`true` when this serializer can write the specified key identifier; otherwise, `false`.
keyIdentifier is `null`.
Determines whether this serializer can write the specified key identifier clause.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteKeyIdentifierClauseCore%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause%29> method.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteKeyIdentifierClause%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause%29> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteKeyIdentifierClauseCore%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause%29> method.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> that represents the key identifier clause to write.
`true` when this serializer can write the specified key identifier clause; otherwise, `false`.
keyIdentifierClause is `null`.
Determines whether this serializer can write the specified key identifier clause.
Called by the base class.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteKeyIdentifierClauseCore%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause%29> method.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteKeyIdentifierClause%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause%29> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteKeyIdentifierClauseCore%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause%29> method.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> that represents the key identifier clause to write.
`true` when this serializer can write the specified key identifier clause; otherwise, `false`.
keyIdentifierClause is `null`.
Determines whether this serializer can write the specified key identifier.
Called by the base class.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteKeyIdentifierCore%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier%29> method.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteKeyIdentifier%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier%29> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteKeyIdentifierCore%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier%29> method.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"></xref> that represents the key identifier to write.
`true` when this serializer can write the specified key identifier; otherwise, `false`.
keyIdentifier is `null`.
Determines whether this serializer can write the specified security token to XML.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteTokenCore%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29> method.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteToken%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteTokenCore%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29> method.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to convert to XML.
`true` when the security token can be written; otherwise, `false`.
token is `null`.
Determines whether this serializer can write the specified security token to XML.
Called by the base class.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteTokenCore%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29> method.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteToken%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteTokenCore%28System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken%29> method.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to convert to XML.
`true` when the security token can be written; otherwise, `false`.
token is `null`.
Reads the key identifier using specified XML reader.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadKeyIdentifierCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadKeyIdentifier%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadKeyIdentifierCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read the key identifier.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"></xref> that represents the key identifier that is read.
reader is `null`.
Reads the key identifier clause using specified XML reader.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadKeyIdentifierClauseCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadKeyIdentifierClause%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadKeyIdentifierClauseCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read the key identifier.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> that represents the key identifier that is read.
reader is `null`.
Reads the key identifier clause using specified XML reader.
Called by the base class.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadKeyIdentifierClauseCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadKeyIdentifierClause%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadKeyIdentifierClauseCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read the key identifier.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> that represents the key identifier that is read.
reader is `null`.
Reads the key identifier clause using specified XML reader.
Called by the base class.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadKeyIdentifierCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadKeyIdentifier%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadKeyIdentifierCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read the key identifier.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"></xref> that represents the key identifier that is read.
reader is `null`.
Reads the security token pointed at by the specified XML reader.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadTokenCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> method.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadToken%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadTokenCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> method.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read the security token.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token type.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the security token that is read.
reader is `null`.
-or-
tokenResolver is `null`.
Reads the security token pointed at by the specified XML reader.
Called by the base class.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadTokenCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> method.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadToken%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadTokenCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> method.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read the security token.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token type.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the security token that is read.
reader is `null`.
-or-
tokenResolver is `null`.
Writes the specified key identifier using the specified XML writer.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.WriteKeyIdentifierCore%28System.Xml.XmlWriter%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier%29> method.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.WriteKeyIdentifier%28System.Xml.XmlWriter%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier%29> method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.WriteKeyIdentifierCore%28System.Xml.XmlWriter%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier%29> method.
A <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> to write the key identifier.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"></xref> that represents the key identifier to write.
keyIdentifier is `null`.
-or-
writer is `null`.
Writes the specified key identifier clause using the specified XML writer.

Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.WriteKeyIdentifierClauseCore%28System.Xml.XmlWriter%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause%29> method.

-or-
writer is `null`.

A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"></xref> that represents the key identifier to write.
keyIdentifier is `null`.
-or-
writer is `null`.
Writes the specified security token using the specified XML writer.

token is `null`.
-or-
writer is `null`.
Writes the specified security token using the specified XML writer.
